article.title: BAE Supports Radar Instrumentation Program
article.text: BAE Systems Technology Solutions & Services Incorporated, Rockville, Maryland, has been awarded a $7,530,004 modification (P00365) to a previously awarded firm-fixed-price, cost-reimbursable, cost-plus-fixed-fee, and fixed-price-incentive-fee contract FA2521-07-C-0009. Contractor will augment the maintenance capabilities for the Instrumentation Radar Support Program with one-of-a-kind parts and supplies, on-site overhauls and emergency technical support. This contract involves foreign military sales. The 45th Contracting Squadron, Patrick Air Force Base, Florida, is the contracting activity.
